name: F2
summary: An elegant, interactive and flexible native charting library for mobile.
description: F2Native is born for mobile visual development. It is out-of-the-box,cross-platform, high-performance visualization solution . Support Android and iOS perfect, moreover have high-performance experience in low-end mobile. Based on the grammar of graphics, F2Native provides all the chart types you'll need. Our mobile design guidelines enable better user experience in mobile visualzation projects.
